column2: "Na sɛ n’ayɛyɛdze yɛ asomdwee afɔr afɔrbɔdze; sɛ ofi anantwi mu
column6: dza onndzii dzɛm na ɔmfa no mbra EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na ɔmfa ne nsa nto n’ayɛyɛdze no etsifi
column3: na onku no wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano: na Aaron mbabanyin asɔfo no mfa bɔgya no mpetse afɔrmbukyia no do nhyia."

column2: "Na onyi asomdwee afɔr no mu bi mbra mbɛyɛ ogya afɔr mma EWURADZE. Onyi seradze a ɔkata ayamudze do no
column3: nye seradze a ɔwɔ do no
column6: na seradze a ɔwɔ ho no
column8: nye berɛbo do ntentan no mfi hɔ."

column2: "Na Aaron mbabanyin no nhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do ɔhyew afɔr no a ɔwɔ nyena no a ɔwɔ ogya no do no do: ɔyɛ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE."
"Na sɛ n’ayɛyɛdze a ɔdze rebɛyɛ asomdwee afɔr afɔrbɔdze ama EWURADZE no fi nguan mu a; onyin o
column4: dza onndzii dzɛm na ɔmfa no mbra."

column3: ɔno ɔmfa no mbra EWURADZE enyim:"

column2: "na ɔmfa ne nsa nto n’ayɛyɛdze no etsifi
column3: na onku no wɔ ehyiadzibuw no enyim: na Aaron mbabanyin no mfa no bɔgyaa mpetse afɔrmbukyia no do nhyia."

column2: "Na onyi asomdwee afɔr no bi mbra mbɛyɛ EWURADZE ogya afɔr; ne seradze no
column3: nye seradze dua mu no nyinara
column4: ɔntwe no wɔ n’ekyir kratse no ho. Na onyi seradze a ɔkata ayamudze no ho no
column5: nye seradze a ɔwɔ ayamudze no do no nyinara
column8: nye no do seradze no a ɔwɔ sisiw mu no
column9: nye berɛbo do ntentan no mfi hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no nhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do: ɔyɛ ogya afɔr edziban ma EWURADZE."

column3: ɔno ɔmfa no mbra EWURADZE enyim:"
na onku no wɔ ehyiadzibuw no enyim; na Aaron ne mbabanyin no mfa no bɔgyaa mpetse afɔrmbukyia no do nhyia."

column2: "Na onyi mu bi mbra mbɛyɛ n’ayɛyɛdze
column3: mekyerɛ ogya afɔr mma EWURADZE; seradze a ɔkata ayamudze no ho no
column4: nye seradze a ɔwɔ ayamudze no do no nyinara
column7: nye no do seradze no a ɔwɔ sisiw mu no
column8: nye berɛbo do ntentan no dze

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no nhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do: ɔyɛ ogya afɔr edziban a oyi nka huanhuam: seradze no nyinara yɛ EWURADZE dze."
"Ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hom ebusuasantsen mu wɔ hom tsenabea nyinara mu
column3: dɛ hom nndzi seradze anaa bɔgya biara."
